com.bergerkiller.bukkit.tc

Class Station

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bergerkiller.bukkit.tc.Station

  • public class Station
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the Station sign information

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void centerTrain()
      Orders the train to center above this Station
      MinecartMember<?> getCenterCart()
      Gets the minecart that has to be centered above the sign
      MinecartMember<?> getCenterCart(int offset)
      Gets the minecart that has to be centered above the sign
      long getDelay()
      Gets the delay between action and launch (in milliseconds)
      org.bukkit.block.BlockFace getInstruction()
      Gets the instruction this station has right now
      - This is SELF when it has to center the train
      - This is the direction to launch to if it has to launch
      - This is null if the station should do nothing and release the train
      LauncherConfig getLaunchConfig()
      Gets the launch configuration, which contains the distance/time and launch function used
      Direction getNextDirection()
      Gets the direction to launch to after waiting
      org.bukkit.block.BlockFace getNextDirectionFace()
      Gets the direction to launch to after waiting, as a BlockFace

      Gets a tag unique to this station's location.

      Gets whether this station has a delay set

      Checks if this Station is valid for use

      Launches the train so that the middle or front cart is launched away from this station.
      void setLevers(boolean down) 
      void waitTrain(long delay)

    • Method Detail

      • getTag

        public java.lang.String getTag()
        Gets a tag unique to this station's location. Is applied to all actions executed by this station
        Returns:
        tag

      • hasDelay

        public boolean hasDelay()
        Gets whether this station has a delay set
        Returns:
        True if a delay is set, False if not

      • getDelay

        public long getDelay()
        Gets the delay between action and launch (in milliseconds)
        Returns:
        action delay

      • isValid

        public boolean isValid()
        Checks if this Station is valid for use
        Returns:
        True if valid, False if not

      • getLaunchConfig

        public LauncherConfig getLaunchConfig()
        Gets the launch configuration, which contains the distance/time and launch function used
        Returns:
        launcher configuration

      • getInstruction

        public org.bukkit.block.BlockFace getInstruction()
        Gets the instruction this station has right now
        - This is SELF when it has to center the train
        - This is the direction to launch to if it has to launch
        - This is null if the station should do nothing and release the train
        Returns:
        instruction

      • getNextDirectionFace

        public org.bukkit.block.BlockFace getNextDirectionFace()
        Gets the direction to launch to after waiting, as a BlockFace
        Returns:
        post wait launch direction

      • getNextDirection

        public Direction getNextDirection()
        Gets the direction to launch to after waiting
        Returns:
        post wait launch direction

      • getCenterCart

        public MinecartMember<?> getCenterCart(int offset)
        Gets the minecart that has to be centered above the sign
        Parameters:
        offset - forwards into the train
        Returns:
        center minecart

      • getCenterCart

        public MinecartMember<?> getCenterCart()
        Gets the minecart that has to be centered above the sign
        Returns:
        center minecart

      • waitTrain

        public void waitTrain(long delay)
        Waits a train for a specific amount of time. This causes the train to play the station sound, refill the fuel and toggle the station levers on.
        Parameters:
        delay - to wait, use 0 for no delay, MAX_VALUE to wait forever.

      • setLevers

        public void setLevers(boolean down)

      • centerTrain

        public void centerTrain()
        Orders the train to center above this Station

      • launchTo

        public void launchTo(org.bukkit.block.BlockFace direction)
        Launches the train so that the middle or front cart is launched away from this station. Station length or launch time is used for this launch.
        Parameters:
        direction - to launch into
